long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hydra is a workflow tool meant to enhance the efficiency of people using the Hydra platform (https://traffic.hydra.tvverify.com/). It allows the user to easily gather data on a facebook video for auditing purposes. It also has an auxiliary functionality that allows the user to set a text and copy it to the clipboard.
